description: Manual country of origin overrides for securities where ISIN country code does not match actual company origin

metadata.purpose: Correct country assignment for ADRs, cross-listings, and other cases where ISIN registration country differs from company origin
metadata.usage: Key is ISIN, value is ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code

US05606L1008.name: BYD Co Ltd
US05606L1008.note: Chinese company traded as ADR in US
